MetaLearner module¶

class MetaLearner.MetaLearner(configs: Dict[str, Any], profile: bool = True)¶

Bases: object

evolve() → None¶

Performs evolution procedures. It uses the rankings received by the evaluations in order to send a evolution config to the Learner. This function is executed only when a Learner has requested an evolution config.

Returns

None

create_learner() → shiva.learners.Learner.Learner¶

Since Shiva is currently developed under a distributed architecture, this function is not being used but instead _launch_learners where the Learners processes are spawned. This function should be used for a non-distributed architecture.

Returns

Learner

get_folder_name() → str¶

Format to be used for the folder name where we are gonna save all checkpoints.

Returns

folder name for the run

Return type

str

log(msg, to_print=False, verbose_level=- 1)¶

Logging function. Uses python logger and can optionally output to terminal depending on the config [‘Admin’][‘print_debug’]

Parameters

  • msg – Message to be logged

  • verbose_level – verbose level used for the given message. Defaults to -1.

Returns

None
